Message.Msg: “Waving the flag at the 1976 Olympics wasn't my idea. It was too much apple pie and ice cream. Not that I don't love my country, but I felt it was my victory up there, I put all the time into it.” – Bruce Jenner Just ask our President Bruce, he would tell you that you're wrong.

AT&T Boosts Stock Buybacks by $11.1 Billion After Profit Climbs http://www.bloomberg.com/news/2012-07-27/at-t-boosts-buyback-program-by-11-1-billion-after-profit-climbs.html?cmpid=yhoo doubling a buyback program the company announced in December 2010.
Year to date T has repurchased 143M shares amounting to $4.6B per the 2Q 7/24/2012 investor update (Page 3 ). Year to date free cash flow is up 18% (Page 13). T can and is executing its buyback plan.
Agree with you on that. Likely more benefits to come for LT holders. A nice unexpectedly performance, becoming a value play.

Message.Title: Uverse incorrect information
Message.Msg: The ATT Uverse Features Guide .pdf document clearly states on page 22: "Create your own instant replays during an exciting game. Or watch the play again in slow motion to see how it was done." I contacted technical support today and was informed that slow motion is not an available feature. Many people like using slow motion, especially when watching sports. Do you think indicating the availability of this feature when it is in fact not available opens ATT to any potential legal action that may influence stock price?

Keep in mind though that the last 300 million share buyback announcement was in 2010 and they are only about half way through that one. Likely not until 2015 before all 600 million are repurchased at that rate. Interesting though, that even though the overall share count is decreasing, the amount posted in Treasury stock on their balance is shrinking. Are they completely retiring these shares or are the buybacks merely offsetting stock options being exercised by management? Not being cynical here, actually asking a question-- does anyone know the full path on this?
A congressional investigation committee needs to be formed to look into this sort of misrepresentation. You got 'em red handed with the PDF document.

You're deluded. Obama is going down. And I hope Romney is going down, too. May the Tea Party well up and present their write-in candidate on the steps of the GOP convention hall ! Progressives are world order communists.
